mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo(num, userId, subject, imageFilename, content) VALUES (photo_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{imageFilename}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM photo p JOIN member1 m ON p.userId=m.userId

SELECT num, p.userId, userName, subject, imageFilename, TO_CHAR(created, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as created FROM photo p JOIN member1 m ON p.userId = m.userId
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT num, p.userId, userName, subject, imageFilename, content, created FROM photo p JOIN member1 m ON p.userId = m.userId WHERE num=#{num}

SELECT num, subject FROM photo p JOIN member1 m ON p.userId=m.userId
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM photo p JOIN member1 m ON p.userId=m.userId
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
